521223.title: Get More Leads
521223.content:
Form abandonment is one of the biggest challenges you need to tackle to grow your business online.

Using the Form Abandonment Addon, you can save partial form submissions and follow up with those interested prospects with an abandonment email, even if they didn’t complete the entire form. This is a smart way to invite them back to complete the form so they don’t forget about you.

521225.title: Give Your Forms a Fresh Look
521225.content:
By default, your forms display fields in one column. With multi-column layout, each field has a layout setting that lets you customize how your fields are displayed.

For instance, with the multiple choice field, you can select 1, 2, or 3 columns to display your choices inside of.

521230.title: Display a Message After Users Submit
521230.content: With the conditional form confirmations feature you can do things like add a Thank You note after a customer makes a purchase or donates to your cause, then provide them with next steps.

520212.title: Improve Your Form Completion Rates
520212.content:
Conversational Forms by WPForms is the first true interactive form layout built exclusively for WordPress that is guaranteed to boost form completion and your overall form conversions.

Instead of asking all twenty questions at once, Conversational Forms takes the one question at a time approach similar to a face-to-face conversation.

521237.title: Boost Form Completion Rates
521237.content:
Sometimes, your forms need to collect a lot of information.

In this case, use the easy drag and drop builder to break long forms into multi-page forms and quickly improve user experience.

521239.title: Customize Your Form Progress Bar
521239.content:
Change the look of your Multi-Page Forms by customizing the Progress Indicator, also known as Breadcrumbs.

WPForms offers 3 different types of breadcrumb layouts for you to choose from for your forms. Plus, you can even change the color to keep the branding of your website consistent.

521246.title: Supercharge Your Forms
521246.content:
You can do some truly amazing things with the power of Zapier + WPForms!

Zapier is a connector service that helps you integrate your forms to 1,400+ apps so you can get more done, faster.

521249.title: Create Distraction-Free Landing Pages
521249.content:
One of the biggest reasons why people abandon your website without filling out your form is distraction.

Use the Form Pages Addon to create completely customized and distraction-free landing pages to boost your conversions.

521259.title: Use Ready-To-Go Forms
521259.content:
With just one click, you can import a form demo template from nearly every niche and industry.

Try using the Form Templates Pack Addon as a quick and simple hack to set up an already fully functioning and ready-to-go form today.

521261.title: Make Your Forms Private
521261.content:
Want to increase the overall quality of your form submissions? You can set up a password using the Form Locker Addon to make sure only visitors with that password can submit to your form.

You may want to do this for a lot of reasons, including collecting reviews, success stories, or if you’re accepting guest posts on your blog.

521266.title: Add Images to Your Fields
521266.content:
If you’d like to make your forms super visual, consider adding images to your forms. A great idea for order forms.

WPForms makes it simple to add images to your Checkboxes, Multiple Choice, and items fields so your users can see the option or item you’ve listed. That way, they can make sure they are selecting exactly what they want.

521269.title: Find Where Your Form Users Come From
521269.content:
You can add a Smart Tag to a Hidden Field on your form to unlock hidden user data. Smart Tags can save you time by allowing you to include useful details in your forms.

For instance, by adding the {url_referer} Smart Tag, your form will automatically insert the address of the page which referred the user to the page containing the form.

521272.title: Close Forms Automatically
521272.content:
The Form Locker Addon has tons of helpful hacks inside of it, including the ability to close forms at a specific date and time.

This is a great tool for things like job applications or any other time-sensitive forms.

521278.title: Want GDPR Compliant Forms?
521278.content: Want to make sure your forms are compliant with the European Union’s General Data Protection Regulation? We've got you covered.

521282.title: Terms of Service or Privacy Policy Too Long?
521282.content:
You can make a scrollable Terms of Service easily! With rising privacy concerns, and the fact that privacy laws are getting more strict, we want to make it easy for you to comply and let your site visitors know their data is protected.

With a scrollable Terms of Service, you can make sure that adding your site’s privacy policy or Terms of Service doesn’t take away from the visual appeal of your form.

521287.title: Prevent Spam
521287.content:
We know spam is a giant issue for contact forms. So, you can use the custom CAPTCHA feature to protect your forms from spam. The Custom Captcha Addon lets you set your own questions and answers to show your visitors.

Or, you can add random math questions to make sure a user is a real human. No one wants fake form submissions!

521289.title: Gather More Reliable Data
521289.content:
Worried people are picking specific choices on your multiple choice fields  just because one is at the top? Maybe you’ve noticed a pattern where one answer is getting picked a lot.

This could happen because of something called Order Bias. So we made it easy to avoid any sort of answer bias by using randomization.

521293.title: Avoid Multiple Entries
521293.content:
With the Form Locker Addon, you can limit one entry per person on your forms and avoid duplicate submissions.

This can be really useful for scholarship applications, giveaways, and more.

521295.title: Re-Use Your Forms

521300.title: Create Forms Fast
521300.content:
Want to add a bunch of choices to your Multiple Choice fields all at once? The Bulk Add option lets you quickly add a long list of items as options in your Multiple Choice fields.

This works great if you’ve got a long list of products or departments and you’re asking your visitor to select just one.

521310.title: Need More Content for Your Blog?
521310.content:
Accepting guest post submissions is a great way to consistently get fresh content for your site.

The WPForms Post Submissions Addon makes it easy to collect user-submitted content in WordPress without users ever having to log in to your website’s admin area.

521313.title: Allow WordPress Users to Register Themselves
521313.content:
If you want to allow user registration on your WordPress site, you can quickly do this by creating a user registration form in WordPress that allows users to fill in the necessary information themselves.

The User Registration Addon lets you set this up in just minutes.

521316.title: Get More Mobile Leads
521316.content:
All forms created with WPForms are completely responsive and mobile-friendly. But did you know that you can easily add a field for a signature with the WPForms Signature Addon?

Best of all, the Signature Addon is mobile-friendly, meaning you’ll get more form completions, less form abandonment, and be able to your online business even faster.

521324.title: Get Paid in Multiple Ways
521324.content: You can use both the Stripe Addon and the PayPal Standard Addon to collect payments. But did you know that you can set up your forms to let your website visitors pick from either payment, right on your form? With Conditional Logic, you can give your visitors more ways to pay you so you can get more money from your site.

521328.title: Boost Your Website Income
521328.content:
Setting up Recurring Payments with Conditional Logic + the Stripe Addon can help you earn even more.

Let visitors choose between One Time or Recurring Payments.

Meaning more money for you and your small business, time and again.

521330.title: See Where Your Leads Are Coming From
521330.content:
You can activate Geolocation to learn more about your audience. Your user’s country, state, and city information will be stored along with their submission.

The more you know about your website visitors, the easier it is to turn more of them into customers with added insight into where they live.

521332.title: Create Connections with Your Audience
521332.content:
Do you see your logo at the top of this email?

A simple but super smart way to make your services stand out is by using branded email notifications. You can add your logo or any image you choose to display on your email notifications.

This way, when a customer or anyone on your team gets an email notification from your forms, they’ll see the image you want them to see. You can help build trust and a relationship right inside your email notification.

521335.title: Get to Know Your Customers
521335.content:
Did you know you can use NPS Surveys to learn about your visitors? Net Promoter Score Surveys can give you valuable visual insights into what’s happening with your business based on customer perception of your brand.

NPS Surveys are used by some of the biggest brands around. They help you to better gauge customer loyalty and make your business more successful.

521337.title: Organize Events
521337.content:
Are you planning a party or event? Then you should definitely be using a WPForms RSVP form. It’s an easy way to grow your business online while also finding out who is attending your event and who isn't.

And not to mention, making the RSVP process easy for your guests makes it easier for them to respond. You’ll get a higher response rate by sharing a link to confirm rather than asking for their replies via snail mail.

521339.title: Collect More Leads
521339.content:
With the Offline Forms Addon, you’ll never lose data or leads again just because someone lost their internet connection and gave up on sending you their information.  The Offline Forms Addon allows your users to save their entered data offline. Then, they can submit it when their internet connection is restored.

This could be super helpful for you to use yourself, too. For example, if you’re at a trade show collecting leads in person and the event has a spotty Wi-Fi connection.

521175.title: Improve Your Form Questions
521175.content: You can easily show or hide something to a website visitor on your forms once they select something that triggers this with Smart Conditional Logic. It’s easy to customize forms to have fields automatically show or hide other fields depending on a user’s selection.

527323.title: Create Forms That Don't Reload When Submitted
527323.content: Keeping a page from refreshing after someone submits on a form makes for an excellent user experience and can even help you get more leads. Ajax-enabled forms are becoming a must-have for websites of all sizes.

521212.title: Send Form Notifications to the Right People
521212.content:
With Conditional Notifications, you can send out different emails to different people / departments depending on what a user selects on your form.

For example, if a user is submitting a complaint and selects that they had an issue with billing, you could have an email go out to a billing coordinator from your team.

521214.title: Redirect Users After They Submit
521214.content:
Did you know you can show visitors different web pages based on which form they submit on your website?

You can apply conditional rules to trigger different things to take place when someone submits to your form!
